name: Loggers Rite
description:
After years and years of desk work, you have gotten tired. So you decide that it's time to do something new. You get a friend to drive you out in the middle of nowhere with nothing but an axe, and then you start your journey to prove to yourself that you are still worthy. Gather wood and slowly build your house from the ground up, for it is your Loggers Rite.

Creators:

Aleksi: https://miika-a-pekkala.itch.io/

Dawg888: https://dawg888.itch.io/

Schenk: https://schenk0.itch.io/

Gameplay Explained:

You click on trees within the fence, and they fall and drop a log. If you click on the log you can pick it up. Then place the log in the log rack next to the foundation by clicking on it. When you have enough logs on your log rack, you can go over to the catalog and click on it, it will automatically build the next stage of the house. Stage prices start at 1 and are increased by one for every stage, there are 4 stages. 

PS, don't try to put more than 11 logs on the log rack. 

Can you find the exit?
